The 암흑맨틀 hangs from a ceiling by a muscular “foot” at the top of its body. It can look like a stalactite, by holding its tentacles stiffly under itself, or like a lump of rock, spreading its tentacles so the membrane between them 엄폐 its body. Its shell and skin usually resemble limestone, but a 암흑맨틀 can change its color to match almost any type of stony background.

A 암흑맨틀 is about 4 feet long from the tips of its tentacles to the top of its head. It weighs about 30 pounds.

전투

COMBAT

A 암흑맨틀 공격 by dropping onto its prey and wrapping its tentacles around the opponent’s head. Once attached, it squeezes and tries to suffocate the foe. A 암흑맨틀 that misses its initial 공격 often flies up and tries to drop on the opponent again.

암흑 (Su): Once per day a 암흑맨틀 can cause 암흑 as the 암흑 spell (시전자 레벨 5th). It most often uses this ability just before attacking.

Improved Grab (Ex): To use this ability, a 암흑맨틀 must hit a Large or smaller creature with its slam 공격. It can then attempt to start a 드잡이 as a free action without provoking an 공격 of opportunity.

If it wins the 드잡이 check, it attaches to the opponent’s head and can constrict.

Constrict (Ex): A 암흑맨틀 deals 1d4+4 points of 피해 with a successful 드잡이 check.

Blindsight (Ex): A 암흑맨틀 can “see” by emitting high-frequency sounds, inaudible to most other creatures, that allows it to ascertain objects and creatures within 90 feet. A 침묵 spell negates this ability and effectively blinds the 암흑맨틀.

스킬: A 암흑맨틀 has a +4 racial bonus on 듣기 and 감지 checks.

These bonuses are lost if its blindsight is negated. The creature’s variable coloration gives it a +4 racial bonus on 숨기 checks.

A 굴삭귀 is about 15 feet long and 10 feet wide. It weighs about 6,000 pounds.

굴삭귀 말하기 Terran and Undercommon.

전투

COMBAT

A 굴삭귀 prefers to fight from its tunnel, which it uses to protect its flanks while lashing out with its flippers.

A 굴삭귀 expecting trouble may honeycomb an 범위 with tunnels, leaving most closed with layers of stone 1 or 2 inches thick.

The 굴삭귀 can quickly dissolve the stone 엄폐 and pop up to 공격 unexpectedly.

Corrosive Slime (Ex): A 굴삭귀 produces a mucuslike slime that contains a highly corrosive substance. The slime is particularly effective against stone. A 굴삭귀’s mere touch deals 2d6 points of acid 피해 to organic creatures or objects. Against metallic creatures or objects, a 굴삭귀’s slime deals 4d8 points of 피해, and against stony creatures (including 땅의 정령) or objects it deals 8d10 points of 피해. A slam 공격 by a 굴삭귀 leaves a patch of slime that deals 2d6 points of 피해 on contact and another 2d6 points of 피해 in each of the next 2 rounds. A large quantity (at least a quart) of water or weak acid, such as vinegar, washes off the slime. An opponent’s 갑옷 and 의류 dissolve and become useless immediately unless the wearer succeeds on a DC 22 Reflex save. 무기 that strike a 굴삭귀 also dissolve immediately unless the wielder succeeds on a DC 22 Reflex save. A creature attacking a 굴삭귀 with natural 무기 takes 피해 from its slime each time an 공격 hits unless the creature succeeds on a DC 22 Reflex save. These save DCs are 건강-based.

암석 조형 (Ex): A 굴삭귀 can alter its slime to temporarily soften stone instead of dissolving it. Once every 10 minutes, a 굴삭귀 can soften and shape up to 25 cubic feet of stone, as a 암석 조형 spell (시전자 레벨 15th).

데몬 are a race of creatures native to chaotic evil-aligned 이세계. They are ferocity personified and will 공격 any creature just for the sheer fun of it—even other 데몬.

—정신감응.

Combat

바바우 are sneaky and sly. They 공격 the most powerful foe first, hoping to eliminate the true threats quickly and then toy with the rest. When ambushing their opponents, they make excellent use of the combination of multiple 공격 and sneak 공격.

A 바바우’s natural 무기, as well as any 무기 it wields, are treated as chaotic-aligned and evil-aligned for the 목적 of overcoming 피해 축소.

Sneak 공격 (Ex): A 바바우 can make a sneak 공격 like a 도적, dealing an extra 2d6 points of 피해 whenever a foe is denied his or her 민첩 bonus, or when the 바바우 is 협공.

A 마법 무기 may attempt a DC 18 Reflex save to avoid taking this 피해. A creature who strikes the 바바우 with an unarmed 공격, unarmed strike, touch spell, or natural weapon takes this 피해 as well but can negate the 피해 with a DC 18 Reflex save. The save DCs are 건강-based.

A 발러 stands about 12 feet tall. Its skin is usually dark red. It weighs about 4,500 pounds.

전투

Combat

발러 love to join battle armed with their swords and whips. If they face stiff 저항, they may 순간이동 away to loose a few spell-like effects at the foe.

A 발러’s +1 flaming whip is a long, flexible weapon with many tails tipped with hooks, spikes, and balls. The weapon deals bludgeoning and slashing 피해, in addition to fire 피해.

A 발러’s natural 무기, as well as any 무기 it wields, are treated as chaotic-aligned and evil-aligned for the 목적 of overcoming 피해 축소.

Death Throes (Ex):When killed, a 발러 explodes in a blinding flash of 빛 that deals 100 points of 피해 to anything within 100 feet (Reflex DC 30 half ). This explosion automatically destroys any 무기 the 발러 is holding. The save DC is 건강-based.

휘감기 (Ex): A 발러’s +1 flaming whip 휘감기 foes much like an 공격 with a net. The whip has 20 히트 포인트. The whip needs no folding. If it hits, the target and the 발러 immediately make opposed 근력 checks; if the 발러 wins, it drags the target against its flaming body (see below). The target remains anchored against the 발러’s body until it escapes the whip.

Spell-Like 능력: At will— 신성모독 (DC 25), 몬스터 지배 (DC 27), 상급 마법 무효화, 상급 순간이동 (self plus 50 pounds of objects only), 광기 (DC 25), 권능의 말씀 기절, 염동력 (DC 23), 부정의 오라 (DC 26); 1/day—화염 폭품 (DC 26), 파열 (DC 27). 시전자 레벨 20th. The save DCs are 매력-based.

Vorpal Sword (Su): Every 발러 carries a +1 vorpal longsword that looks like a flame or a 화살복제 of lightning.

Summon 데몬 (Sp): Once per day a 발러 can automatically summon 4d10 드레치, 1d4 헤즈루, or one 낼페쉬니, 글라브레주, 마릴리스, or 발러. This ability is the equivalent of a 9th-레벨 spell.

Flaming Body (Su): The body of a 발러 is wreathed in flame.

Anyone grappling a 발러 takes 6d6 points of fire 피해 each round.

진실의 시야 (Su): 발러 have a continuous 진실의 시야 ability, as the spell (시전자 레벨 20th).

스킬: 발러 have a +8 racial bonus on 듣기 and 감지 checks.

각 라운드별 전술

Tactics Round-by-Round

The 발러 is most effective as a ranged combatant, using its spell-like 능력 to 공격 from a distance.

Prior to 전투: 부정의 오라.

Round 1: 화염 폭품 or 파열 and quickened 염동력, or summon additional 데몬. If the 발러 does not deem itself seriously threatened, it conserves 능력 usable only once per day and uses 신성모독 instead.

Round 2: 광기 or 권능의 말씀 기절.

Round 3: Full melee 공격 with 무기, including 휘감기 with whip.

Round 4: 순간이동 or 비행 away with entangled foe to reestablish 거리; repeat round 1 and continue.

A 발러 who wants to drive off or neutralize a party without slaying its foes avoids lethal 공격.

Prior to 전투: 부정의 오라.

Round 1: 몬스터 지배.

Round 2: 권능의 말씀 기절.

Round 3: 광기 or 염동력 to incapacitate or repel a dangerous opponent.

Round 4: 순간이동 or 비행 away to reestablish 거리; repeat round 1 and continue.

If any of the following 주문 are cast at the 포식귀 and overcome its 주문 저항, they affect the imprisoned essence instead: 추방, 혼돈의 망치, 혼란, 짓누르는 절망, 생각 감지, 악 무효화, 인간형 지배, 공포, 기아스/임무, 성스러운 말씀, hypnosis, 감금, 마법 단지, 미로, 제안, 영혼의 덫, or any form of charm or compulsion. In many cases, this deflection effectively neutralizes the spell. Some of these effects might eliminate the trapped essence, depriving the 포식귀 of its spell-like 능력 until it can consume another victim.
